column1: * 1920 - Voice actor Victor Platt is born.
* 1929 - Writer and actor Bernard Mayes is born.
* 1936 - Stanley Unwin reads the typescript of The Hobbit.
* 1964 - The first episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
* 1964 - Voice actor Quinton Flynn is born.
* 1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mary Fairburn (10 October 1968).
* 1979 - The Jackanory episode "Fire and Water" is aired on the BBC.
* 2006 - The J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia: Scholarship and Critical Assessment is published.
** Glorfindel travels towards the Last Bridge.
